title: President Donald J. Trump and His Administration are Empowering Women to Enhance Peace and Prosperity Around the World â€“ The White House
content:
Fact Sheets			

		Law & Justice	

Issued on:
June 11, 2020
Nations that empower women are much wealthier, safer, and much more politically stable.
						President Donald J. Trump					EMPOWERING WOMEN TO PROMOTE PEACE: The Trump Administration is releasing new plans to enhance the safety, leadership, and meaningful participation of women in political and civic life worldwide.SIGNIFICANT PROGRESS: Through each of these plans, the Administration is taking significant steps to promote the safety, leadership, and involvement of women around the world.LEADING THE GLOBAL EFFORT: The Trump Administration is leading the global coalition to advance the role women play in peace and security globally.
